alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:30AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN VENANGO... NORTHEASTERN BUTLER...NORTH CENTRAL INDIANA...JEFFERSON...NORTHERN ARMSTRONG AND CLARION COUNTIES THROUGH 430 AM EDT... At 330 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Shanor-Northvue, or 14 miles west of Rimersburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Butler, Punxsutawney, Clarion, Brookville, Knox, Rimersburg, Homeacre-Lyndora, Shanor-Northvue, Reynoldsville, Brockway, New Bethlehem, and Sykesville. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 42 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northwestern and west central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango
